vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.9;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747) and Aridai (H0742)
§ Vajezatha = "strong as the wind"
one of the 10 sons of Haman who were hanged with their father
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瓦耶撒他 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "像風一樣猛烈的"
哈曼的十個兒子之一, 他們和哈曼的屍骨都被掛在木架上 {#斯 9:9|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
瓦耶撒他 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "像风一样猛烈的"
哈曼的十个儿子之一, 他们和哈曼的尸骨都被挂在木架上 {#斯 9:9|}
